android.permission.RECORD_AUDIO.description: Allows application to access the audio record path.

android.permission.MODIFY_AUDIO_SETTINGS.description: Allows application to modify global audio settings, such as volume and routing.

android.permission.INTERNET.description: Allows an application to create network sockets.

android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAG.description: Allows an application to write to the SD card.

android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE.description: Allows an application to read from SD Card.

android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the status of all networks.

android.permission.VIBRATE.description: Allows the application to control the vibrator.

android.permission.EXPAND_STATUS_BAR.description: Allows application to expand or collapse the status bar.

android.permission.FOREGROUND_SERVICE.description: Allows a regular application to use Service.startForeground

android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE.description: Allows an application to view the information about the status of Wi-Fi.

android.permission.WAKE_LOCK.description: Allows an application to prevent the phone from going to sleep.

manifest_analysis.title:
Application Data can be Backed up
[android:allowBackup] flag is missing.
manifest_analysis.desc: The flag [android:allowBackup] should be set to false. By default it is set to true and allows anyone to backup your application data via adb. It allows users who have enabled USB debugging to copy application data off of the device.
manifest_analysis.name: Application Data can be Backed up [android:allowBackup] flag is missing.

manifest_analysis.title: Launch Mode of Activity (com.equize.library.activity.ActivityMain) is not standard.
manifest_analysis.desc: An Activity should not be having the launch mode attribute set to "singleTask/singleInstance" as it becomes root Activity and it is possible for other applications to read the contents of the calling Intent. So it is required to use the "standard" launch mode attribute when sensitive information is included in an Intent.
manifest_analysis.name: Launch Mode of Activity is not standard.

manifest_analysis.title:
Broadcast Receiver (com.equize.library.widget.Widget1x1) is not Protected.
An intent-filter exists.
manifest_analysis.desc: A Broadcast Receiver is found to be shared with other apps on the device therefore leaving it accessible to any other application on the device. The presence of intent-filter indicates that the Broadcast Receiver is explicitly exported.

playstore_details.title: Equalizer Pro - Volume Booster & Bass Booster
playstore_details.description:
Music Equalizer is a powerful Equalizer, Bass Booster, Sound Changer & Volume Amplifier which improve the sound quality of your Android phone or tablet devices. With the most professional Bass Boost and 3D Virtualizer, Equalizer makes your music and video sounds like never before.🎷🎸🎻
Use professional audio, video decoding technology that allows high-fidelity music and video playback. In addition, the most Professional EQ will help you manually control your music play volume, boost your music and amplify your audio.🚀🎻

🔊Key Features:
🎵Professional preset sound effects(Normal, Classical, Dance, Straightness, Folk, Heavy Metal, Hip Hop, Jazz, Pop, Rock, Acoustic, Bass_boost, Treble_Boost, Vocal Boost, Headphone, Deep, Electronic, Latin, Loud, Lounge, Piano, RB )
🎵Stereo surround sound effect
🎵Five bands Music Equalizer
🎵Customize presets
🎵Volume Booster
🎵Bass Boost effect
🎵Virtualizer effect
🎵Equalizer Volume Amplifier
🎵Music visualization Spectrum
🎵Easy to play and control music
🎵Notification control supported
🎵Home screen widgets(1x1, 4x1, 2x2)
🎵Bass booster for headphones
🎵18 gorgeous background

Music Equalizer with the best five band Equalizer, Bass Boost and Virtualizer effects. Equalizer Pro lets you adjust the sound effect levels so you can get the better out of your music. FREE download this fantastic Music Equalizer and get better musical enjoyment!🎧🎶
playstore_details.summary: Music Equalizer with extra loud sound speaker & Bass booster & Volume changer
playstore_details.summaryHTML: Music Equalizer with extra loud sound speaker & Bass booster & Volume changer
